DOC.detailed_description: Anorexia nervosa disorder cause people maintain unhealthily low body weight , often eat little exercise much . Treatment anorexia nervosa often begin supervised program raise person 's weight healthy level . This study monitor activity level inpatient treatment 1 year hospital discharge order determine impact physical activity weight gain anorexia treatment . Participation study last 1 year participant discharge inpatient treatment anorexia nervosa . Discharge base person 's progression treatment may vary among participant . During study , participant activity monitor two three times—at low weight , 90 % ideal body weight ( IBW ) , , participant living near study clinic , within 6 week discharge hospital . Two monitoring device attach participant continuously 48 hour first two assessment 72 hour third . The first device SenseWear armband , wireless monitor strap back upper arm measure body movement body temperature . The second Intelligent Device Energy Expenditure Activity ( IDEEA ) monitor , consist five sensor tap participant 's foot , thigh , chest . The device measure activity level energy expenditure . Participants complete blood draw within 1 week complete activity monitoring assessment . Participants also complete computer `` work '' task two time points—at 75 % IBW 90 % IBW . This task last 40 minute involve tap keyboard order earn reward . Adult participant also complete dual X-ray absorptiometry ( DXA ) test ass body composition 90 % IBW reach . Follow-up assessment occur 1 , 2 , 4 , 8 month discharge . These involve phone call in-person visit health , body weight , eat disorder symptom discuss . One year discharge , participant attend in-person assessment involve complete questionnaire interview . Healthy participant recruit control group , participant complete one session activity monitoring , one blood draw , self-rating form without follow-up measurement .
